mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply_tb(reply_no,category,game_no,msg,id) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(reply_no)+1,1) FROM reply_tb), #{category}, #{game_no}, #{msg}, #{id} )
mapper.select: select reply_no,game_no,msg,regdate,member_tb.id,reply_tb.id,member_tb.pimg FROM reply_tb,member_tb where reply_tb.id=member_tb.id AND game_no=#{game_no} ORDER BY regdate desc
